**A MIXED DOCUMENT WITH VARIOUS HEADINGS**

A document that starts with an asterisk ALL-CAPS heading.

## A Second-Level Heading

But there is no first-level hash heading above.

**An inline heading:** This is an inline heading using asterisks.

***Subsection***

A subsection that is both bold and italic.

*Deeper Subsection*

A subsection that is only italic. This should be nested under the previous subsection that is both bold and italic.

***Another Subsection***

This should be at the same level as previous subsection.

# THIS IS ALL CAPS AND FIRST-LEVEL

## Another Second-Level Heading

This should be at the same level as the first second-level heading.

### A Third-Level Heading Without Text

**This is a bolded asterisk heading**

And it has some content.

THIS IS ALL CAPS BUT NOT A HEADING

## This should not count as a heading because it is too long

This is just a normal paragraph following the long line that looked like a heading.
